thread.title: Someone has mocked up a Disney movie poster that HAS to happen | Metro News
thread.title_full: Someone has mocked up a Disney movie poster that HAS to happen | Metro News

author: Jessica Walford For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Someone has mocked up a Disney movie poster that HAS to happen | Metro News
text:
Jessica Walford for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 6:51 pm We’re intrigued by this fan-made Disney movie (Picture: Disney) 
Just when we thought *every* possible Disney princess film had been made, someone goes and makes a poster for another one – and it literally sounds amazing. 
Reddit user teagone shared their artwork for the film called Punched , and it was an instant hit – hogging the top spot for hours. 
The image shows a girl in a hoody wearing boxing gloves, with a tagline that says: ‘Most princesses wear a ring. This princess dominates one.’ 
Sounds right up our street. 
Using that *incredible* fan art, posters came up with some crazy ideas about what the film should be about. Someone posted this fake Disney poster online but now we all want to watch it (Picture: Reddit/teagone) 

Film fans seemed to know exactly what Punched would be about if it were to be Disney-fied (apart from boxing, obviously). 
One user wrote: ‘Spoiler alert: she’s undefeated, she gets beat, training montage, and then she wins her title back. End of movie.’ 
To which another replied: ‘Cmon this is Disney here. She’s undefeated, gets beat, training montage. ALMOST wins the title back, then realises the life around her is more important.’ 
Too true.
